001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005
006public final class RationalLongSupport implements JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<Long>> {
007
008    private static final Rational<Long> ONE = new Rational<>(1L, 1L);
009    private static final Rational<Long> MINUS_ONE = new Rational<>(-1L, 1L);
010    private static final Rational<Long> ZERO = new Rational<>(0L, 1L);
011
012    protected RationalLongSupport() {
013    }
014
015    @Override
016    public String name() {
017        return "Rational with Long";
018    }
019
020    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
021    @Override
022    public Rational<Long>[] createArray(int length) {
023        Rational<Long>[] array = (Rational<Long>[]) new Rational<?>[length];
024        Arrays.fill(array, ZERO);
025        return array;
026    }
027
028    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
029    @Override
030    public Rational<Long>[][] createArrayOfArrays(int rows, int columns) {
031        Rational<Long>[][] rationals = (Rational<Long>[][]) new Rational<?>[rows][columns];
032        for (Rational<Long>[] array : rationals) {
033            Arrays.fill(array, ZERO);
034        }
035        return rationals;
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public Rational<Long> multiply(Rational<Long> first, Rational<Long> second) {
040        return rational(first.numerator() * second.numerator(),
041                first.denominator() * second.denominator());
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    public Rational<Long> divide(Rational<Long> first, Rational<Long> second) {
046        return rational(first.numerator() * second.denominator(),
047                first.denominator() * second.numerator());
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    public Rational<Long> add(Rational<Long> first, Rational<Long> second) {
052        if (first.denominator().equals(second.denominator())) {
053            return rational(first.numerator() + second.numerator(), first.denominator());
054        }
055        if (first.denominator() % second.denominator() == 0) {
056            long factor = first.denominator() / second.denominator();
057            return rational(first.numerator() + second.numerator() * factor, first.denominator());
058        }
059        if (second.denominator() % first.denominator() == 0) {
060            long factor = second.denominator() / first.denominator();
061            return rational(first.numerator() * factor + second.numerator(), second.denominator());
062        }
063        return rational(first.numerator() * second.denominator() + second.numerator() * first.denominator(), first.denominator() * second.denominator());
064    }
065
066    private Rational<Long> rational(long numerator, long denominator) {
067        if (numerator == denominator) {
068            return ONE;
069        }
070        while (numerator % 10 == 0 && denominator % 10 == 0) {
071            numerator = numerator / 10;
072            denominator = denominator / 10;
073        }
074        long gcd = gcd(numerator, denominator);
075        if (gcd != 1) {
076            numerator = numerator / gcd;
077            denominator = denominator / gcd;
078        }
079        return new Rational<>(numerator, denominator);
080    }
081
082    private static long gcd(long a, long b) {
083        a = Math.abs(a);
084        b = Math.abs(b);
085        while (b != 0) {
086            long temp = b;
087            b = a % b;
088            a = temp;
089        }
090        return a;
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public Rational<Long> minusOne() {
095        return MINUS_ONE;
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public Rational<Long> one() {
100        return ONE;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public Rational<Long> zero() {
105        return ZERO;
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public boolean equals(Rational<Long> first, Rational<Long> second) {
110        return first.numerator() * second.denominator() == first.denominator() * second.numerator();
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public boolean greaterThan(Rational<Long> first, Rational<Long> second) {
115        return first.numerator() * second.denominator() > first.denominator() * second.numerator();
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public Rational<Long> squareRoot(Rational<Long> value) {
120        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
121    }
122
123    @Override
124    public Rational<Long> valueOf(double value) {
125        if (!Double.isFinite(value)) {
126            throw new IllegalArgumentException("NaN/Infinity not supported");
127        }
128        if (value == 0.0) return ZERO;
129        value = Math.round(value * 1000) / 1000.0;
130        String s = Double.toString(value);
131
132        // Handle scientific notation by converting to plain string
133        if (s.contains("E") || s.contains("e")) {
134            s = new java.math.BigDecimal(s).toPlainString();
135        }
136
137        int pos = s.indexOf('.');
138        long numerator;
139        long denominator;
140
141        if (pos == -1) {
142            // No decimal point
143            numerator = Long.parseLong(s);
144            denominator = 1L;
145        } else {
146            int digitsAfter = s.length() - pos - 1;
147            String digits = s.substring(0, pos) + s.substring(pos + 1);
148
149            numerator = Long.parseLong(digits);
150            denominator = (long) Math.pow(10, digitsAfter);
151        }
152
153        return numerator == denominator ? ONE : rational(numerator, denominator);
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public Comparator<Rational<Long>> comparator() {
158        return (o1, o2) -> greaterThan(o1, o2) ? 1 : greaterThan(o2, o1) ? -1 : 0;
159    }
160}
